text: Chekonidhara is a census town in Jorhat district in the state of Assam, India. ==Demographics== India census, Chekonidhara had a population of 7315. Males constitute 50% of the population and females 50%. Chekonidhara has an average literacy rate of 85%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; with male literacy of 85% and female literacy of 84%. 8% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Jorhat district Category:Jorhat
title: Chekonidhara
